divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my mon and son at pier 39 in san francisco and decided to take a picture of alcatraz island to post to facebook from my droid bionic on full zoom. I never noticed the obdject in the sky untill I looked at the picture . let me say again I never saw the obdject untill looking at the picture some time later. It is in the to left of the picture. Thanks looking into tis matter . I thought it was quite siginifigant. Ragards, John M. Poulson

Summary: It looks like a cowboy hat, grey color.
